story.title: International 7-Day News Agenda
story.summary: Go to https://agenda.afp.com to consult AFP AgendaContact us on contact-agenda@afp.comAFP International 7-Day News AgendaPlease note that all times are in GMT. For full details of our coverage of top stories, please see our regularly updated News Advisory(+) : Event added in the last 24 hours.(*) : Event updated in the last 24 hours.WEDNESDAY, SEPTEMBER 25, 2019Asia-PacificHONG KONG (China) - Activists charged with rioting appear at court, protesters rally outside (0630 GMT) LIVE VIDEO....

xmlText.p: Go to https://agenda.afp.com to consult AFP Agenda
Contact us on contact-agenda@afp.com
Please note that all times are in GMT. For full details of our coverage of top stories, please see our regularly updated News Advisory
(+) : Event added in the last 24 hours.
(*) : Event updated in the last 24 hours.
WEDNESDAY, SEPTEMBER 25, 2019
Asia-Pacific
HONG KONG (China) - Activists charged with rioting appear at court, protesters rally outside (0630 GMT) LIVE VIDEO. VIDEO.
TELUK BAHANG (Malaysia) - World's longest tube water slide to be unveiled at Escape theme park VIDEO. PICTURE.
Europe
(*) MONACO (Principality of Monaco) - IPCC press conference to present special report on the ocean and cryosphere (0900 GMT) LIVE VIDEO. PICTURE. VIDEO.
(+) LONDON (United Kingdom) - Parliament reopens after Supreme Court strikes down suspension (1030 GMT) VIDEO. PICTURE. LIVE VIDEO.
(+) MOSCOW (Russia) - Venezuela's Maduro visits, meets Putin PICTURE. VIDEO. LIVE VIDEO.
(+) STOCKHOLM (Sweden) - Rights Livelihood Prize winner announced
(*) BERLIN (Germany) - National forest summit (1130 GMT)
PARIS (France) - Verdict in defamation case filed against French #MeToo founder (1300 GMT) LIVE VIDEO. VIDEO.
BRIGHTON (United Kingdom) - Labour Party annual conference VIDEO. LIVE VIDEO.
BAIKONUR (Kazakhstan) - Astronauts from US, Russia, UAE blast off for ISS PICTURE. VIDEO. LIVE VIDEO.
MONACO (Principality of Monaco) - Monaco Yacht Show (0800 GMT) PICTURE.
(+) BRUSSELS (Belgium) - EU Parliament Brexit steering committee meets (1300 GMT) LIVE VIDEO. VIDEO.
TARBES (France) - Verdict in trial of performance artist Deborah de Robertis over nude pose in Lourdes sanctuary (2200 GMT)
MADRID (Spain) - Ryanair pilots go on strike (To 29)
PARIS (France) - Paris Fashion Week Womenswear (To October 1)
North America
UNITED NATIONS (United States) - UN General Assembly general debate PICTURE. VIDEO. LIVE VIDEO. (To 30)

NEW YORK (United States) - Bloomberg Global Business Forum PICTURE.
NEW YORK (United States) - Day two of the UN General Assembly general debate PICTURE. VIDEO. LIVE VIDEO.
(+) NEW YORK (United States) - Foreign ministers from signatory countries to the Iran nuclear deal JCPOA meet PICTURE. VIDEO. LIVE VIDEO.
(+) UNITED NATIONS (United States) - Trump meets Japan PM Abe on sidelines of UNGA PICTURE. VIDEO. LIVE VIDEO.
(+) UNITED NATIONS (United States) - Trump meets his Ukrainian counterpart Volodymyr Zelensky PICTURE. VIDEO. LIVE VIDEO.
(+) UNITED NATIONS (United States) - Trump holds presser on sidelines of UNGA PICTURE. VIDEO. LIVE VIDEO.
(+) WASHINGTON (United States) - Expected publication of Trump call with Ukrainian President Zelensky amid whistleblower scandal VIDEO.
LOS ANGELES (United States) - Darth Vader's mask among Hollywood artefacts being auctioned (To 26)
SEATTLE (United States) - Amazon unveils new Alexa and Echo products VIDEO.
LOS ANGELES (United States) - Annual AirWorks conference on drones PICTURE. VIDEO. (To 26)
Middle East and North Africa
(+) ALGIERS (Algeria) - Algeria court sentences Bouteflika brother to 15 years
DUBAI (United Arab Emirates) - Cityscape Global property exhibition (0430 GMT) VIDEO. PICTURE. (To 27)
(+) DOHA (Qatar) - Students march against climate change in rare protest (0930 GMT) PICTURE. VIDEO.
(*) DUBAI (United Arab Emirates) - Takeoff of the UAE's first astronaut into space (1200 GMT) PICTURE. VIDEO. LIVE VIDEO.
RABAT (Morocco) - Contemporary Art Biennale (To December 18)
(+) TUNIS (Tunisia) - Court rules on request to release jailed presidential contender Nabil Karoui VIDEO.
Sub-Saharan Africa
SOUTH AFRICA - Prince Harry, Meghan on southern Africa regional tour PICTURE. LIVE VIDEO. VIDEO. (To October 2)
(+) LILONGWE (Malawi) - Fresh post-election protests against President Mutharika's rule (To 27)
LUANDA (Angola) - Corruption, money laundering trial of son of ex-president Dos Santos begins (To October 2)
Latin America
LIMA (Peru) - Constitutional court rules on opposition leader Keiko Fujimori's request for release from jail VIDEO.
(+) BRAS√çLIA (Brazil) - Supreme Court hearing on case that could lead to Lula's conviction being overturned VIDEO. LIVE VIDEO.
MEXICO CITY (Mexico) - Protest ahead of fifth anniversary of disappearance of 43 students in southern Mexico PICTURE.
(+) MEXICO CITY (Mexico) - Oscar-winning director Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu gives a master class in his native Mexico
Sports
(*) DOHA (Qatar) - Sebastian Coe set to be re-elected IAAF president, as only candidate VIDEO.
JAPAN - Rugby World Cup, with New Zealand going for third straight title LIVE VIDEO. GRAPHIC. VIDEOGRAPHICS. (To November 2)
THURSDAY, SEPTEMBER 26, 2019
Asia-Pacific
SEOUL (South Korea) - Bulgaria's PM Boyko Borissov visits PICTURE.

Latin America

MEXICO CITY (Mexico) - Protest to mark five years since disappearance of 43 students in southern Mexico VIDEO. PICTURE.

BRAZIL - Football: Copa Sudamericana 2019 - Semi final Second Leg (To 27)

Europe

NEW YORK (United States) - Sentencing hearing for Ali Kourani, American of Lebanese descent and Hezbollah member convicted for planning attacks

RIYADH (Saudi Arabia) - S&P issues its updated rating for Saudi Arabia
EGYPT - Businessman Mohamed Aly calls for million-man anti-Sisi protests PICTURE. VIDEO. (To 28)
Sub-Saharan Africa
(+) SOUTH AFRICA - Banking sector employees hold strikes over job cuts
HUAMBO (Angola) - Prince Harry meets mine clearers in southern Angola PICTURE. LIVE VIDEO.
DAKAR (Senegal) - Inauguration of new Massalikoul Djinane mosque, said to be West Africa's largest VIDEO.
Sports
DOHA (Qatar) - World Athletics Championships VIDEO. LIVE VIDEO. GRAPHIC. (To October 6)
BARCELONA (Spain) - Court hearing in case brought by Neymar against FC Barcelona (0800 GMT) VIDEO. LIVE VIDEO.
SATURDAY, SEPTEMBER 28, 2019
Worldwide
WORLD - International Safe Abortion Day

AFGHANISTAN - Presidential election PICTURE. GRAPHIC. VIDEO. LIVE VIDEO.

(*) MEXICO CITY (Mexico) - Rally for International Safe Abortion Day VIDEO.
Sports

SOCHI (Russia) - F2 racing championship, round 11, with Mick Schumacher (To 29)
